item.title: Find Files and Sort Them By Time on Linux
item.description: Recursively search for files by name with find. Then, sort the result by time, newest first with ls -lt. $ find . -type f -name "Makefile*" -exec ls -lt {} + -rw------- 1 al al 1916 Feb 17 12:44 ./cc-python/{{cookiecutter.project_repository}}/Makefile -rw------- 1 al al 1862 Feb 17 12:41 ./data-api/Makefile -rw------- 1 al al 963 Feb 16 15:45 ./personal-website/Makefile -rw------- 1 al al 254 Feb 15 17:07 ./cc-python/Makefile
